overview: Footage from the Director's original short films "Horror House" (2008), "Return To Horror House" (2009) and the unfinished "Horror House 3" (2010) were edited together as "Horror House Cult Murders" in 2012. Almost 10 years later, it was re-titled to "Asylum of The Devil" and re-worked into the 3rd film in the "WXIP-TV Channel 6" Trilogy, also known as "The Abduction Trilogy" by degrading the image to look retro and adding faux commercial breaks and promos.
title: Asylum of the Devil
